title: Pure Bliss
description: Bliss, Colorado, gave Hope McLean a second chance at life, but she's hiding a dark secret.Raised as brothers, James Glen and Noah Bennett always dreamed of finding a woman to share their lives on the Circle G ranch. James would run the ranch, while Noah served the town of Bliss as the resident vet. But when a woman came between the brothers, Noah fled for New York City and James was left to struggle for the ranch's survival alone.Now that Noah has returned, he will do anything to repay his debt to James. When he sees Hope, he knows she is the woman they both have been waiting for. But just as their love begins to bloom, a nightmare from Hope's past returns to claim her.To save Hope, and themselves, they will have to reclaim the brotherhood that was shattered and fight for their future.
author: Sophie Oak
